remarks: Convert a theorem for real/complex numbers into one for positive integers.  (Contributed by Jeff Hoffman, 17-Jun-2008.)
statement:
nnssi3.1 $e |- NN C_ D $.
nnssi3.2 $e |- ( C e. NN -> ph ) $.
nnssi3.3 $e |- ( ( ( A e. D /\ B e. D /\ C e. D ) /\ ph ) -> ps ) $.
nnssi3 $p |- ( ( A e. NN /\ B e. NN /\ C e. NN ) -> ps ) $.
